name: FarmersRebelion
description:
The King has gone mad and has increased the tax rate to 112%. As the sole Farmer Time Mage you take it uppon yourself to dethrone the King.

Controls:
WASD to move.
Left Mouse button to attack.
Space to slow down time.
Top right shows the direction of the king.

(P.S. Kind of had to rush it last minute as I'm going to a sushi resturant with friend. If you find any bugs please MSG me @stamen9 on discord)
